title: Integrated Information Literacy Education for Strengthening Mathematical Research Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate research material search and evaluation skills required in the mathematics curriculum. Implements an embedded learning environment through collaboration between teachers and librarians

learning_goals: Students can identify reliable online/offline resources for math research projects with 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically collect and cite mathematical papers and data using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can present three or more criteria for evaluating the credibility of information sources during team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
